title: 2022 Week 4 Preview (Day 3 from London!)
itunes:title: 2022 Week 4 Preview (Day 3 from London!)
description:
A media studio filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal preview all the Week 4 action from the NFL UK Offices! We start with the primetime matchups between the Chiefs and Bucs (4:30) and Rams vs Niners (9:32). Before the draft begins, we hit the Vikings-Saints London game (exclusively on NFL Network and NFL+) (18:14). Handsome Hank stops by to chat (41:00), the heroes draft the remaining games, and everyone gives their lock of the week. 

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
